name: Would you kindly?
description:
Created for the 2020 GlobalStartupCities Game Jam we wanted to bring some happiness into 2020. Enjoy helping little Sam out with the daily tasks in your hometown.

We used two awesome Assetpacks from the unreal market which where very helpful.
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-asset-pack
by Steven Christopher
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-forest-03
by TomkaGS

And a lovely cartoon font:
https://www.dafont.com/big-bottom-cartoon.font
by Karen B. Jones

The Soundtrack was provided by Christian Becking
https://www.christian-becking.de/

Created by Team:  Lifelight Entertainment
We are:
https://trollmeisterxd.itch.io/
https://ploeptz.itch.io/
https://werbenjagermanjensen.itch.io/
https://paranoid1909.itch.io/

We were not able to fix every gamebreaking problem before submitting. So until it is rated this Game will stay (a little) broken. We will update it until it is properly playable after the Game Jam is concluded.
